Services include:Assessments and evaluationParenting educationFamily counselingSupport groups for youthSupport referrals"}},{"id":"211colorad-a0h4T000002u0eYQAQ","type":"filtered_provider","attributes":{"category":"family","provider_name":"FAMILY CAREGIVER SUBSIDY","street":"9197 W 6th Ave","city":"Lakewood","state":"CO","lat":"39.724993","lon":"-105.100127","description":"Offers financial assistance to individuals interested in becoming a Certified Nurse Aide (CNA) in order to assist a family member who needs care."}},{"id":"211colorad-a0h4T0000017LiVQAU","type":"filtered_provider","attributes":{"category":"family","provider_name":"SUPPORT FOR SURVIVORS OF ABUSE","street":"11100 W 8th Ave","city":"Lakewood","state":"CO","lat":"39.728300","lon":"-105.122100","description":"Provides coordinated services for survivors of abuse and connects individuals and families to community partners who offer comprehensive legal, emotional, and critical support."}},{"id":"211colorad-a0h4T000002tzkVQAQ","type":"filtered_provider","attributes":{"category":"family","provider_name":"COMMUNITY-BASED SERVICES","street":"1501 Albion St","city":"Denver","state":"CO","lat":"39.740278","lon":"-104.938944","description":"Provides trauma-informed behavioral health interventions, skill building psychoeducation and resources to families through a team approach that includes a primary therapist, behavior coach, and case manager.\r\nIncludes the following programs:Intensive In-Home Therapy serves youth (aged 6 - 17) who have mental health issues that interfere with functioning at home, school, or in the community.Early Childhood CBS Program is an extension of IIH dedicated to infants and toddlers (aged 0 - 5) and their caregivers who are experiencing a variety of issues related to this sensitive stage of development."}},{"id":"211colorad-a0h4T000003fW3LQAU","type":"filtered_provider","attributes":{"category":"family","provider_name":"FOSTER CARE RECRUITMENT \u0026 PLACEMENT","street":"2821 South Parker Rd","city":"Aurora","state":"CO","lat":"39.665770","lon":"-104.860480","description":"Provides: Foster care recruitment and placement servicesFoster care family supportive servicesLicensing supportOngoing parenting classes"}},{"id":"211colorad-a0h4T000003faKaQAI","type":"filtered_provider","attributes":{"category":"family","provider_name":"FAMILY MEDICINE","street":"1001 Yosemite St","city":"Denver","state":"CO","lat":"39.731955","lon":"-104.884775","description":"Offers primary care services for the entire family, including:Family planningObstetricsWellness checks for children"}},{"id":"211colorad-a0h4T000003faKbQAI","type":"filtered_provider","attributes":{"category":"family","provider_name":"FAMILY MEDICINE","street":"12600 E Albrook Dr","city":"Denver","state":"CO","lat":"39.781091","lon":"-104.843940","description":"Offers primary care services for the entire family, including:Family planningObstetricsWellness checks for children"}},{"id":"211colorad-a0h4T000003faKfQAI","type":"filtered_provider","attributes":{"category":"family","provider_name":"FAMILY MEDICINE","street":"4995 E 33rd Ave","city":"Denver","state":"CO","lat":"39.764063","lon":"-104.929874","description":"Offers primary care services for the entire family, including:Family planningObstetricsWellness checks for children"}}]}
